decision_conditions: Due to the submission of inconsistent, contradictory plans and incorrectly scaled plans, Officers are unable to fully assess whether the proposed development would fall within the parameters of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B & C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Notwithstanding reason for refusal number 1 (the submission of inaccurate information), the applicant has failed to indicate that the materials used in any exterior work would be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse, in conflict with Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B, Condition B.2 (a) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Notwithstanding reason for refusal number 1 (the submission of inaccurate information), the applicant has failed to indicate that the proposed rooflights would not protrude more than 0.15 metres beyond the plane of the slope of the original roof when measured from the perpendicular with the external surface of the original roof, in conflict with Schedule 2, Part 1, Class C (b) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
description: Erection of rear dormer roof extension with installation of 3no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion
